Posted By: @go (10/18/2009 8:03:17 PM)
Rating:

Combos rather nicely with Greed, but I suppose that's beside the point.

Throw in Words of Worship and we'll restart the conversation.

Exile a card: Add .
: Draw a card and lose 2 life.
: Gain 3 life.

To cut a long story short, this combination allows you to turn any card in your hand into:
1) A Rite of Flame that can only be cast for (instead of its normal );
2) An Inspiration that can only be cast for 4 life (instead of its normal );
3) A Catalog that can only be cast for 1 life (instead of its normal );
4) A Healing Salve (roughly) that can only be cast for (instead of its normal );
in addition to giving you access to a permanent Channel at double the life-cost, as well as the abilities of each enchantment on its own.

____________How That Works____________
Exile a card for . (-1 cards... (see all)

posts.post_content: @NeoKoda This card is the "Bloom" part of the combo deck Prosperous Bloom (the other part is [Prosperity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Prosperity)). Former pro player Mike Long was match lossed at Nationals while piloting the deck when someone noticed an extra copy of Cadverous Bloom sitting in his lap.
posts.html:
@NeoKoda This card is the "Bloom" part of the combo deck Prosperous Bloom (the other part is Prosperity). Former pro player Mike Long was match lossed at Nationals while piloting the deck when someone noticed an extra copy of Cadverous Bloom sitting in his lap.
